original: intros a b H1 H2 H3. unfold distinct_parity in H3. destruct H3 as [[H4 H5] | [H6 H7]]. - apply Z.lt_le_incl. rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Z.lt_trans with (m := a * a + b) (p := b * b + a). + rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_r. * apply Z.sqr_sum. apply H2. * apply Z.lt_le_incl in H4. apply H4. + rewrite <- Z.add_comm. apply Z.lt_le_incl. apply Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg_l. * apply Z.lt_le_incl in H5. apply H5. * apply Z.rem_mul_r. { apply H2. } { apply Z.pow_nonzero. apply H1. apply Z.le_0_1. } - apply Z.lt_le_incl. rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Z.lt_trans with (m := a * a + b) (p := b * b + a). + rewrite Z.add_comm. apply Z.mul_lt_mono_pos_r. * apply Z.sqr_sum. apply H2. * apply Z.lt_le_incl in H6. apply H6. + rewrite <- Z.add_comm. apply Z.lt_le_incl. apply Z.mul_le_mono_nonneg_l. * apply Z.lt_le_incl in H7. apply H7. * apply Z.rem_mul_r. { apply H2. } { apply Z.pow_nonzero. apply H1. apply Z.le_0_1. }
